Key_Features: Heat resistant, Highly Flexible, Long life, Flame retardant
Short_Description: Flexible Tinned copper, EPR Type IE2 insulated, Elastomeric Type Polychloroprene Polymer (PCP) sheathed 1100V rubber cable
Full_Description: POLYCAB RR-P MC, IS 9968-1 tinned copper conductor, EPR insulated and CPE sheathed cable conforming to IS 9968-1 is designed to use for fixed wiring, single phase or three phase (earthed or unearthed) system for rated voltage up to and including 1100 V.
